casebody.data:
Enyka M. GAINES and Ricco R. Gaines, petitioners,
v.
FEDERAL HOME LOAN MORTGAGE CORPORATION, et al.; and Linda D. Bernard, petitioner,
v.
Federal Housing Finance Agency, et al. No. 14-804. Supreme Court of the United States April 20, 2015.

Opinion

Motion of Michigan Legal Services, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.
